full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Tender Title
River Surveyor

## Tender Information
| Field | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Government Reference Number | WS4094547056-Doc4230378718 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-19T14:00:00 (Expired) |
| Solicitation Number | WS4094547056 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | None |
| Expected Contract End Date | None |
| Regions of Delivery | British Columbia |
| Contracting Entity | Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) |
| End User Entity | Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) |
| Contact Information |
| * Contact Name | Shaylan Stein (HE/HIM) |
| * Contact Email | shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca |

## Tender Description
The Canadian Hydrographic Service (CHS) of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires a River Surveyor instrument as a backup solution in case the existing Xylem/Sontek M9 instrument fails. The new instrument must be identical to ensure interoperability with vessel mounting hardware and existing software and instrumentation. The Council invites suppliers to provide a proposal for the procurement of this instrument.

**Important Dates:**

*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-19T14:00:00 (Expired)
*   Publication Date: 2023-10-03
*   Amendment Date: 2023-10-03
*   Expected Contract Start Date: None
*   Expected Contract End Date: None

**Notice URL:**
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17613878?extsite=MTc2MTM4NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17613878?extsite=MTc2MTM4NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Language of the Proposal:**
In no case will bilingual capability be required or considered an advantage for this contract. However, since the vast majority of data distributed by the Federal Government is available only in English, the submission of either bilingual or English, appendices-only proposals is encouraged. The proposal will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price.
